```{r}
# need to install.packages for ggplot2, tidyverse, lubricate

library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
pomodoro <- read_csv("pomodoro.csv")
```

```{r}
pomodoro %>% 
  mutate(date = date(Timestamp), pom_length = PomodoroLength/60) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = pom_length)) + geom_histogram(stat = "identity", fill = "darksalmon") + xlab("Date") + ylab("Length of Pomodoro (in minutes)") + ggtitle("Pomodoro Timer Usage") + theme_minimal() 


```
